mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(userId, userType, userRealName, userName, password, sexual, accountChangeTime, phoneNum, email, ancestralPlace, politicalStatus, groupID, registerCode, userAge) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userType}, #{userRealName}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{sexual}, #{accountChangeTime}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{ancestralPlace}, #{politicalStatus}, #{groupID}, #{registerCode}, #{userAge}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userType = VALUES(userType), userRealName = VALUES(userRealName), userName = VALUES(userName), password = VALUES(password), sexual = VALUES(sexual), accountChangeTime = VALUES(accountChangeTime), phoneNum = VALUES(phoneNum), email = VALUES(email), ancestralPlace = VALUES(ancestralPlace), politicalStatus = VALUES(politicalStatus), groupID = VALUES(groupID), registerCode = VALUES(registerCode), userAge = VALUES(userAge);
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM User WHERE userId = #{userId} and userName = #{userName}
mapper.select:
select * from User
userType = #{ userType }
and userRealName like concat('%', #{ userRealName } , '%')
and userId like concat('%', #{ userId } , '%')
